title: Summer House: Got Milk?
description:
This episode also available as video on Crappens On Demand http://bit.ly/crappensvideo
This week on Summer House, we find out that Kyle was breastfed for way too long which explains quite a bit. Luke isn't the prince we'd hoped he'd be, but Jordon is the fool we figured he was so it all evens out. For the new premium bonus on Netflix' Tiger King, become a member over at Patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens.
**New merch! Isolate and BenRon 2020 Vote Hypocrat designs available at crappensmerch.com
**Crappens Live has been postponed until our country is healthy again. Keep up with our live show calendar at at watchwhatcrappens.com

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
